item.title: Monoculture in Matching Markets
item.description: Algorithmic monoculture harms applicant selection and market efficiency; this paper introduces a model to analyze its effects in two-sided matching markets.

item.title: Simple and Effective Masked Diffusion Language Models
item.description: Simple masked discrete diffusion models achieve state-of-the-art language modeling results, closing the performance gap with autoregressive methods by using a novel training recipe and a Rao-Blackwell…
